name: Charming Riverview Apartment
address: Long Bien 1, Mipec Long Bien Tower B, 17th floor, suit 1707, Long Bien District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Located in Hanoi, this apartment features an outdoor pool. Featuring private parking, the apartment is 1.8 km from Old City Gate.

Other facilities at Charming Riverview Apartment include a sun terrace.

Dong Xuan Market is 2 km from Charming Riverview Apartment, while Thang Long Water Puppet Theater is 2.1 km away. Noi Bai International Airport is 20 km from the property.
